DBsheetParams.query: SELECT T2.title+'/'+p.pub_name AS title_id, T1.lorange, T1.hirange, T1.royalty FROM pubs.dbo.roysched T1 INNER JOIN pubs.dbo.titles T2 ON T1.title_id = T2.title_id LEFT JOIN pubs.dbo.publishers p ON T2.pub_id = p.pub_id WHERE T1.lorange > ? and T1.hirange < ?

field.name: *title_id
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.title+'/'+p.pub_name AS title_id,!T!.title_id FROM pubs.dbo.titles !T! LEFT JOIN pubs.dbo.publishers p ON !T!.pub_id = p.pub_id ORDER BY !T!.title
